content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Iron Ore Mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) for storing extracted iron ore

#### Smelting Setup at position (52.0, -79.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (52.0, -79.0)
- Burner inserter at position (53.5, -79.5) for moving items into the furnace
- Chest at position (54.5, -79.5) for storing smelted iron plates

#### Coal Storage at position (43.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Chest at position (43.5, -80.5) for storing coal
- Burner inserter at position (42.5, -80.5) for moving items between chests

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when inserting items into a full chest
- Ensure the chest at the drop position has enough space before inserting items. Empty the chest at (-14.5, -48.5) to continue mining.

#### Errors when smelting without ingredients
- Ensure the furnace has the necessary ingredients before attempting to smelt. Insert iron ore into the furnace at (52.0, -79.0) to start smelting.

#### Errors when inserters are waiting for source items
- Ensure the source chest has items available for the inserter to pick up. Check the chest at (41.5, -80.5) for items to be moved.

### NAMESPACE

#### Variables
- `transport-belt`: int
- `burner-mining-drill`: int
- `stone-furnace`: int
- `coal`: int
- `iron-ore`: int
- `iron-plate`: int
- `iron-gear-wheel`: int
